name: Cracked Up (itch)
description:
• Tap on the left side of the screen to move left, 
  • tap on the right side of the screen to move right.
  • tap in the top-middle to jump.
  • tap and hold for continuous movement.
  • Avoid black oil, touch the blue water to grow

node server.js from the root directory to start the server

load http://localhost:3000/ to view game afterwards

built with:

  1. visual studio
  2. google chrome
  3. socket.io
  4. phaser3.js
  5. jquery.js
  6. express.js
  7. node.js
  8. npm.js
  9. js.cookies.js
  10. rpggui.css
  11. gyro.js
